org.apache.flink.networking

类 NetworkFailuresProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.networking.NetworkFailuresProxy
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class NetworkFailuresProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    This class acts as a network proxy - listening on local port and forwarding all of the network to the remote host/port. It allows to simulate a network failures in the communication.
